home.welcome: Welcome to Il Parchettista Toscano di Boghian Dan - Ristrutturazioni edili
home.description: We offer professional parquet installation services throughout Tuscany.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Il Parchettista Toscano di Boghian Dan has over 30 years of experience in the installation of parquet and other floor and wall coverings, repairs, skirting boards, painting, parquet restoration, furniture, doors, windows, construction work, etc. Supply of parquet, fixtures, complete renovation of apartments, houses, offices.

services.title: Our Services
services.installation_desc: We install high-quality parquet with attention to every detail.
services.renovation_desc: We give new life to existing floors with modern solutions.
services.consulting_desc: We offer expert advice tailored to each project.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us for a free quote or more information.
